transcript:
Customer: Ji, daal dijiye sir.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Isme hello.
Executive: Haan ji sir, namaskar kaise hain?
Customer: Kaise ho?
Executive: Ji ji, main badhiya hun, badhiya hun sir. Aap bataiye sir.
Customer: Bas thik hun.
Executive: Sir, direct aa nahi rahi wo inquiry wagera.
Customer: Ab to jyada dhyan de raha hun, ab to ab laga lo ki agar koi bhi inquiry aati hai to within one minute message wagera bhej ke baat kar leta hun.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Achcha achcha achcha. Kya direct inquiries kya kam ho gayi hai?
Customer: Haan, idhar kaafi ek mahine se kam hai.
Executive: Achcha. Aur yahan pe aa rahi hai ekdam aap dekho. Aur kuch ek baar dekhna content kuch galat rakhte hue.
Customer: Kya cheez ho gayi?
Customer: Matlab jaise ki tum maan lijiye aapne school desk ka likha hua hai school desk aur chair laga rakhi hai wo student chair.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Basically issue ko bhai. Haan, wo main wo main check kar leta hun, thik hai. Aap sir by lead wagera sir use kar rahe ho aap proper?
Customer: Haan ji, kar raha hun sir, by lead kaam ki nahi aa rahi. Tab wo isliye bol rahe the ki report sahi nahi aa rahi is wajah se. Nahi nahi, by lead agar sir aap proper use nahi karte ho na to isse direct inquiries bhi kam ho jaati hai. Thik hai, uska wo rehta hai. I wish aap dekho.
Customer: Dhan ki abhi baki bahut bas thik hai lagbhag lagbhag.
Executive: Sir, baat kijiye hamare senior se sir.
Customer: Aapne whatsapp ka pucha tha, unse baat hui thi sir se hamari?
Customer: Mujhe yaad nahi hai proper. Shayad wo dobara hui thi ya nahi hui thi whatsapp wale usme.
Executive: Nahi, aapne ek wo bhi bataya tha na ki whatsapp ke liye aapko matlab ki chahiye koi software wagera matlab ki jisse wo ho jaye connect wagera aur maximizer ke liye maine aapko discussion kiya tha to uske liye.
Customer: Direct wagera hai hamara whatsapp pe message aata hai. Justdial ka bhi whatsapp pe message aata hai. To mujhe kya aisi services India IndiaMART mein hai ya nahi?
Customer: To direct by lead hamare whatsapp par aa jaati hai. Koi inquiry aayi to whatsapp pe aa jaati hai to response karna thoda aasan hota hai.
Executive: Achcha.
Executive: Okay okay, main samajh gaya sir. Baki wo is type wagera hai wo aap mote package mein dete ho wo abhi isliye koi mota package lenge to ye bhi aake baat karenge.
Executive: Business to sir aapka achcha hai IndiaMART pe itne saal se aap promotion bhi kar rahe ho sir. Fir isme ghabrane wali kya baat hai sir IndiaMART se?
Executive: Aapko to maine bataya tha sir maximizer service kaafi best rahega aapke liye. Thik hai, aapka personal branding hoga usme. Aapka usme website wagera dikhaya tha sir maine aapko ki website kaisa lagega aapka uske baad. Usme bas chair chair ka aapka basically achche se photos wagera isme rahega usme promotion hota rahega. Kaafi visibility kaafi effect padta hai sir.
Executive: Agar aap sir available the to abhi ek video meeting karke aapko hath dikha deta ki kis type ki rehti hai sari cheeze. Baki to decision aapke hath mein hi rahega koi payment wagera to aapko karne nahi bol raha.
Customer: Abhi aap ek baar profile check kar lo jo hamari present time mein chal rahi hai usme kya dikkat hai response mein.
Executive: Nahi nahi, wo to main dekh raha hun sir. Uska to aapse to baat hoti rehti hai meri. Aapka to page main hamesha barabar kholta hi rehta hun. Thik hai.
Executive: Baki main dobara dekh leta hun koi issue wali baat nahi hai sir isme.
Customer: Jab main time nahi deta hun to alag baat hai. Thik hai, char panch din se main time de raha hun to main dekh raha hun ki response aa nahi rahi.
Executive: Achcha achcha.
Executive: Okay. To ye panch panch din se proper follow up kar raha hun main.
Executive: Koi nahi sir, line pe raho main abhi dekh leta hun. Aapka issue matlab ki kya aa raha hai isme leke.
Executive: Thik hai. Pehle to sir aap bata rahe the ki aapke koi employee wagera use karte the. Tab se sir issue aa raha tha kya?
Customer: Nahi karte the tabhi to dikkat hai. Wo itna time nahi dete the phone mere paas hota tha main deta nahi tha dhyan.
Customer: Wahi kar rahe hain. Achcha achcha. Us din wo karte nahi the isliye maine kaha mere paas hai is time to main khud hi dekh raha hun dekhne ke baad kya response hai kya nahi hai fir main IndiaMART se baat karunga.
Customer: Sabse proper time de raha hun.
Executive: Nahi nahi, main aapka main bata raha hun sir aapke photos wagera to main dekh raha hun sir aap 183 products aapne add karke rakhi hai. Thik hai.
Customer: Mujhe score thoda thik kar do aap.
Executive: Awaaz sir kam aa rahi hai aapki.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Maine kaha sir actually kya hai ki aapki na awaaz thodi si kam aa rahi hai jiski wajah se mere ko samajh nahi aa raha hai properly.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Main aapko call back kar raha hun sir dobara.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving direct inquiries.

- By leads are not working properly.

- Wants to fix the score.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to check the profile.

- Executive suggested maximizer service for personal branding.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back due to voice issue.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, profile, maximizer
